Descripcion: Choose your Tamer and fight dangerous creatures with your companions - powerful Mystlings! Travel the mysterious world of Dragon Eclipse. Catch and train Mystlings to put together your own team! Build a strong card deck and create efficient synergies of three Mystlings to fight your enemies.

Elevate your PC experience with charming desktop pets. Inspired by such a wonderful invention as Shimeji, Desktop Pet Project has tried to collect the most interesting and curious mechanics. You can summon up to two pets that will have slight personalities in behavior.
Create your own virtual mate with a game-style character customization tool. Debut your ideal as a VTuber, or make it your own secret friend. Create your meta soulmate now!

Nombre: Automobilista 2 - Circuit des 24 Heures du Mans
Descripcion: The mecca of Endurance racing arrives to AMS2! Modelled with the aid of detailed laser scan data this DLC features the modern 24h track along with its shorter Bugatti layout.
seduce girl or get into fight, you can do anythings in virtual night club that you can't do in real life.

Discover an immersive ocean Eco-Sim where you can be almost any animal under the sea! From a tiny seahorse to a massive blue whale, experience the endless circle of life in a massive world of reefs, shipwrecks, and hidden wonders.
Step into the frozen unknown in Forsaken Frontiers, a cooperative analog horror adventure set in the unforgiving embrace of an everlasting winter.

Will you be the savior to purify this land? The Monarch is a lane-defense game where you control a monarch, expand your kingdom, and defend against evil by strategically managing gold resources, recruiting diverse units, and exploring a world filled with mythical threats.
You are trapped in an endless hallway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach your destiny.

Prometheus Wept is a party and action point turn based RPG set in a near-future, post-digital Earth. The game offers hardcore squad-level combat, simultaneous battles between cyberspace and the physical world, meaningful choices, deep character progression and an advanced crafting system.

Alcyone: The Last City is an interactive sci-fi novel where your choices can lead to the salvation or destruction of the last refuge of civilisation in the universe. Immerse yourself in a branching narrative of diverse characters, intrigue, and world-altering decisions.

Feywing is a short game loosely inspired by classic internet ritual stories. You must memorize and navigate the strange environment of the Crossroads to collect materials for the ritual, and escape the Crossroads. During all of this, the whimsical Feywing will be there to guide you along.

Dynamic Dungeons Editor is an easy-to-use local tabletop tool for game masters to display video maps or images on a digital gaming table, TV, or projector. Import Dynamic Dungeons maps or your own images or videos, use tokens and props. Make a playlist, apply fog of war, or a custom grid overlay.
Touhou meets real-time warfare! Explore maps, gather resources, and build your army! Become the conqueror of Gensokyo!

This is an action game in which the player builds and controls a giant robot. The game features ground crawling 3D maneuvers, customizable elements, picturesque characters, and scenarios. Even those who have never been good at action games will surely find that Vulture will respond to their needs.

Danger and Deadlier is a hardcore medieval fantasy dungeon adventure game. Join intense 6v6v6 battles with different classes. Dungeon-style exploration lets you find valuable treasures. What are you waiting for? Join this gold rush now!"

A third-person survivor roguelike game where waves of zombies come at you. By killing them, you get random opportunities to acquire equipment, weapons, and new skills. You can have up to 8 skills, giving you immense power. Come and see how far you can go!

Escape From Clive is a simulated real war evacuation computer game. Successfully evacuating to safety zone is your ultimate goal. Players would go into the Clive and come back with fruitful supplies. Remember that if you are ambushed, you will lose everything.

A funny shooting game where you can customize the gameplay, such as zombies holding submachine guns and shooting aliens, or wolf dogs holding samurai swords and fighting special forces in close combat... How unexpected the settings will be depends on your imagination.

BARA Labs is a short collection of experimental prototype games made by our team. We will decide whether or not to make a full-length game out of the shorts based on how the prototypes are received by the players.

"Zombie World War: New World" is a shooter where players and three AI teammates battle a massive zombie invasion. They must cooperate using skills and strategies to survive and defeat mutants. Intense combat with high-quality graphics and PBR materials providing a visually stunning experience.

A hilarious medieval fantasy adventure with an epic world that will immerse you. Strange and diverse monsters let you build a unique team, while the funny yet profound storyline will make you laugh and ponder.
Legacy's Allure is a customizable, card-based wargame with no randomness. Command warriors, beasts, and mages on the battlefield to outplay your opponent in this chess-inspired fantasy battle.

Join Captain Leeway on the biggest Heist yet to save botkind from a brewing water crisis! With tactical turn-based battles featuring signature ricochet action, 150+ weapons and items, a new job system, real-time naval combat and 30+ hours of gameplay, prepare for an epic SteamWorld adventure!

Nombre: Kiana & Biscuit - Pirates on a Visit! Demo

Descripcion: NGU Idle is a Free To Play Idle game that's full of weird humor, tons of upgrades and hundreds of hours of content! Try out NGU Idle today and experience the joy of Numbers Going Up!

Assume the role of President Anton Rayne and guide the nation of Sordland. Amidst brewing international conflicts, need for reform, deep-seated corruption, and economic recession, you must make the decisions in this political drama. How will you lead?

A visually lifelike 1-6 player co-op survival horror made in Unreal Engine 5. Explore 7 procedurally generated levels that host liminal environments, puzzles, and entities with new levels and content added regularly. You are at the mercy of what's lurking and must do whatever it takes to escape.

Hardcore horror open world survival game which throws the player into the middle of the extermination of mankind with the sole purpose of surviving long enough to find a way to bring down the alien machines. Loot buildings, fight off hostile survivors, stay hidden from the machines, and stay alive.
Rage Simulator is a minimalist hand-drawn beat-em-up simulator. I made this little game for myself and for you guys, I just wanted to beat something up.
The Slay the Princess OST and over 160 HD Wallpapers. Buy this if you want to further support the developers!
即使存在相同的目的，每个人也会有各自的实现方式，理念背道而驰的两人，就算共处一室，也始终无法理解对方。 能跨越这道鸿沟的，就只有……
Desarrollador: 置雨制作组, 龍之咲

Descripcion: Defender's Squad is a sci-fi vertical scrolling shooter 2D that combines 7 different levels. Play Solo and pick one of the 3 ships to kill enemies and save the earth from aliens.
Turn the tide of the war with nuanced strategies in One-inch Tactics, introducing players to a unique turn-based strategy experience.

Explore and discover the secrets of a non-linear cave. Document everything you find in your logbook. You cannot return unless you find every single information about every monster, plant, ore and point of interest.

Skeletal mischief reigns as the Skulltide begins! Join the undead in co-op adventures as the skeleton of your dreams, or lead them yourself, and hunt down the necromancers who reanimated you. Build, throw, and enchant your bones... but try not to misplace them along the way!

Hot Land is a RPG that combines automoated production and tower defense.Freely build defense and production buildings within a limited map, develop their own industries.or contend with the major faction on the battlefield and make a fortune from the war.
ATOM RPG is a post-apocalyptic indie game, inspired by classic CRPGs: Fallout, Wasteland, Deus Ex, Baldur's Gate and many others.
Don't Look at It! White room is a psychological horror game where you'll survive in a white room as long as possible. You'll die of fear if you look at It. Avoid them and protect yourself..
RC Quadcopter Racing Simulator - Fly (and crash!) all you want regardless of the weather, all for the price of a few replacement props.
Golden Treasure is a game for those who carry dragons in their hearts. Hunt, explore, survive, and become Great among the True Children of Sun and Earth.

Stolen Realm is a simultaneous turn-based tactical dungeon crawling looter with action RPG elements where you control up to 6 heroes, solo or through online co-op, venturing forth in adventures set in a high-fantasy, low-poly world.

'Warm Snow' is a Rogue-like action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction.

A co-op horror game like no other... Play with 1-4 players online as you solve puzzles, collect items and run from the horrors that lie within. Follow in the footsteps of Joan in the story mode or tackle procedurally generated maps that scale with your level and bring a fresh experience each game..

An unemployed young man came back to the town where he grew up, the town has not changed much since he was a child, and he has left his good youth in the big city, while he is still single and poor, so he regains his confidence and is determined to build for the prosperity of his hometown.
Massacre hordes of enemies and destroy the inquisition in our brutal real-time deckbuilding roguelike. Your future lies in the cards, witch!
Explore an entire fantasy world, explore Cat City the beating heart of cats, defeat small or huge bosses, also remember to give Astra some cookies or a cup of Tè before you leave.

Nombre: Spiritual Bond ~Breaking the curse, Intertwining fates~
Descripcion: “Anyone who is destined, please help us....” A text-based puzzle game themed around shrine Miko. Explore an abandoned village, ancient and mysterious shrines, and eerie sacrificial rituals by combining nouns and verbs. Gradually uncover the truth hidden behind the story.

Build and manage your own wildlife compound, determine which animals to feature, how to manage the business while ensuring that all the animals are thriving. • Build a giant animal park from scratch and manage it well • Choose a variety of terrains with different climates and environmental sounds • 45 detailed, seamlessly animated and...

G-Force draws you into the adventures of an elite team of trained guinea pigs on a mission to thwart a sinister plot to destroy the world. Take control of both G-Force commander Darwin and his sidekick, Mooch, as they apply their talents to defeat an evil army of altered household appliances.
Swing through urban landscapes using a needle and your wool as a grappling hook to stop the environmental pollution from ruining your peaceful island life - as fluffy sheep do.

Survive relentless entities, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover the dark secrets of your surroundings. With an XP system, crafting, and resource management, every decision matters. Will you find your way out—or become another lost soul?

An RPG of exploration, collection, and critical thinking. The end of the world has come and gone, leaving only phantoms where once there was life. Now Schorl, the last surviving human, and Spinel, the last of the magical saerii, search through the memories of a bygone era, hoping to find a future.

Figment is an action-adventure game that invites you to explore a unique surreal universe filled with music, humor and multi layered narrative. Join Dusty and his ever-optimistic friend, Piper, on an adventure through the different sides of the mind seeking to restore the courage that's been lost.
Take a step closer to the world of Little Nightmares with this copy of the original soundtrack composed by Tobias Lilja.

At the edge of the forest lies a small Woodville town. One day the town became shrouded in mist and no one could pass through. Citizens began to disappear, one by one and fear gripped the town. Unravel the mystery of the Shadows and free the town from their dreadful fears!
“4X-Galaxy” is a game developed by the 4X concept system(eXplore、eXpand、eXploit、eXterminate)
Experience the thrilling adventures of the Parr family as they conquer crime and family life through both Disney-Pixar films The Incredibles and Incredibles 2, in a LEGO® world full of fun and humor.
Editor: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac)

Descripcion: A cozy yet eerie adventure, where every path is the right one, and every action leads to discovery. Explore and influence Raven Brooks, a half-abandoned town simulated in real-time.
The story of Cal Kestis continues in STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor™, a galaxy-spanning, third-person, action-adventure game.
国产FPS巅疯制作...

Neon Spellstorm is an action roguelite where you race along a crumbling neon path as a powerful wizard, wielding limitless magic. Unleash devastating spells, stack wild synergies, and reshape a destructible, otherworldly terrain that falls away behind you!
Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a bite-sized, Survival-lite, Turn-based Dungeon crawler with a cozy vibe.

Take a late-night ride in Synthwave Tunnel! Race through neon-lit, rhythm-generated paths, pushing your reflexes to the limit. Speed through dynamic obstacles, synced to the beat, and conquer the ultimate challenge. Can you reach the end?

A thrilling twist on classic word games! Plan your move, secretly plant bombs and watch the fun explode as opponents trigger your traps. Cross their booby-trapped words, and their hard work goes boom! Use your bomb to clear obstacles or sabotage rivals—every turn is a blast in this word puzzler!
You venture through your mind, trying desperately to wake up from your nightmares. Will you make it out?

Midpoint is a 2D Metroidvania with RPG elements. Destroy, dodge, and steal spiritual energy from your foes. Be possessed by spirits of light and darkness to gain unique upgrades, sacrifice certain traits to unlock greater power. Free the world before being consumed by darkness.

Get access to exciting additional content for The Escapists 2 with the season pass. Test your escaping expertise by breaking out of three exhilarating new prisons with extra items, customisations and thrilling new ways to escape!
Desarrollador: Team17 Digital Ltd, Mouldy Toof Studios

Descripcion: Challenge your friends in fast-paced fantasy soccer matches! Play as 4 different characters, compete in unique game modes, and score as many goals as you can!
You can't clear it, can you, mister? So lame, so lame ♡♡♡

Project QT is a puzzle RPG filled with hot chicks, amazing battles and the naughtiest rewards. Recruit your team of sexy girls and fight the evil infection that has spread into your world. Humanity needs you, so join the greatest and smuttiest adventure in the multiverse!

Nuclear Frost is an action-adventure first-person shooter where you have to face the threats that the new world has brought to bear. Fight mutants, keep yourself warm, avoid radiation and fight fungus to save your home.
Dancing? This is very easy! Try this HENTAI DANCE game!
9 original game soundtracks HENTAI DANCE.

Brand new truck simulation game, experience fun from a variety of truck driving. Drive around the original Chinese map, complete hundreds of specialty tasks through different cities. Meet in the mountains, rivers, lakes and seas. Let’s share your truck life.
Become a motorbike mechanic and build your empire. Buy, repair, renovate, and create your own dreamed custom motorcycle.

The player will play the role of an older unmarried young man Lao Wang, because of the lack of money for marriage in thinking of ways to accidentally be attracted by the pop-up ads of an online game endorsed by a certain celebrity, and the gears of destiny began to turn at that moment.

Engage in chaotic multiplayer battles in Trigger Fever, a top-down shooter party game. Crush foes solo or with friends, wielding 50+ unique weapons. Show off skills, tactically dominate, and embrace the crazy onslaught!
Interstellar Rogue is a Sci-Fi Rogue-like where you go on a one Ship mission to destroy The ultimate Robot enemy of humanity. It's inspired by various Retro greats such as lander, Metroid and Rogue.

Nombre: 九劫曲：诅咒之地 NINE TRIALS
Descripcion: There are immortals everywhere in Shenzhou. One day, A curse comes. The cursed people will have a mark on their body, known as "indescribable mark".Until the full moon night,the cursed person will be inhaled into the alien world. Players play one of the immortals and start their own journey to survive.
Minimalist style game : plankton simulation, an electronic pet generated by math codes. Under your care it will slowly grow up and evolve.
After a freak accident, a seemingly ordinary chicken becomes a bomb laying free range hero. Explore the versatile mechanic of laying bombs in this explosive exploration platformer.
《The Immortal Scripture》 is a unique tactical puzzle game, where each level is a puzzle. Solve all the levels to attain the path to immortality, but is it really achievable?

Addictive and exciting, Luxor is an action-puzzler that takes you on a thrilling adventure across Ancient Egypt. Isis has enlisted you to battle Set and his evil minions. Use your scarab to shoot and destroy the approaching spheres before they reach the pyramids. Use Isis magic by catching talismans, gems, and Ankh coins.
A fast-paced multiplayer party game with blocks, spinning blades, and ghosts. Oh my!
Battle a never ending swarm of enemies, but be sure to surrender before you die...

Rise of Prussia Gold is the new and improved version of AGEODs Seven Years War (1757-1763) game set in Europe. This hugely detailed strategy game was initially released by AGEOD in 2010 and the Gold version adds numerous improvements and additional scenarios that take the game to the next level.

Extend the lunar mayhem with the Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel Season Pass featuring new characters, challenges, missions, and more! Harness the power of your good looks with the “Handsome Jack” Character Pack; raise your level cap & battle waves of enemies in The Holodome Onslaught; and two more add-on Packs!
Barbarian Brawl is a fast-paced, third-person multiplayer brawler, where hoards of angry, dangerous and hungry Barbarians are out to fight, kill and eat ham... Possibly not in that order.
